meanings.definition: Gudes (noun): a Scottish term for goods or possessions
meanings.sent1: She packed all her gudes in a suitcase before moving.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper displayed various gudes on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended her toys were magical gudes.
meanings.sent4: His heart was filled with treasured gudes from his travels.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with shiny gudes.

meanings.definition: Gudes (verb): to guide or lead someone in a particular direction
meanings.sent1: The tour guide gudes visitors through the museum.
meanings.sent2: He gudes his team with clear instructions and encouragement.
meanings.sent3: The GPS gudes us even when we think we know the way.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition always gudes her to make the right decisions.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse gudes ships safely through the stormy seas.
